title: Crisis
subtitle: Eruption!
description: Mount Salbarii erupts while the Travellers are conducting their survey. What was a straightforward job becomes a desperate rescue operation as the volcano threatens the region.
dramatic_purpose: Crisis and complications - everything goes wrong, heroes are made

moral_choices.refugee_priority: 11 refugees at Barvinn vs 3 Vargr (chauffeur's parents)
moral_choices.risk_assessment: How much danger are PCs willing to accept?
moral_choices.following_orders: Masterton commands resources - do PCs comply?

atmosphere.music_suggestion: Disaster movie tension, punctuated by moments of hope

narrator_notes: This is where the adventure shifts from 'get the ship' to 'be heroes.' The eruption doesn't just threaten - it transforms the story. The chauffeur rescue is the moral heart of the adventure. Will the PCs risk their newly-acquired ship for three Vargr?
